```lisp
(:action choose_boat
    :parameters (?passenger - passenger ?boat - boat)
    :precondition (and (at ?passenger near_boat) (not (in ?passenger ?boat)))
    :effect (and (chosen ?passenger ?boat) (not (at ?passenger near_boat)))
)

(:action hold_rails
    :parameters (?passenger - passenger ?boat - boat)
    :precondition (and (chosen ?passenger ?boat) (not (holding_rails ?passenger ?boat)))
    :effect (holding_rails ?passenger ?boat)
)

(:action choose_item
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?context - context)
    :precondition (and (in_context ?agent ?context) (not (chosen ?agent ?item)))
    :effect (and (chosen ?agent ?item) (updated_context ?agent ?context))
)

(:action choose_boat_with_context
    :parameters (?passenger - passenger ?boat - boat ?context - boat_context)
    :precondition (and (in_context ?passenger ?context) (not (chosen ?passenger ?boat)))
    :effect (and (chosen ?passenger ?boat) (updated_context ?passenger ?context))
)

(:action hold_item
    :parameters (?entity - entity ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (chosen ?entity ?item) (at ?entity near_item))
    :effect (holding ?entity ?item)
)

(:action stabilize
    :parameters (?entity - entity ?environment - location)
    :precondition (and (in_contact ?entity ?environment) (at ?entity near_stabilization_point) (not (stabilized ?entity)))
    :effect (stabilized ?entity)
)
```
